titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for dissolving the Parliament
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Whitehall, the nineteenth day of May, one thousand six hundred seventy and four years, and of Our Reign the six and twentieth year.
Signed: Al. Gibson, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
